menu_l_global_value_predator_mod: This is a Predator Pack Item!
bm_suit_predator_desc: ''Whoah! How did the PAYDAY Gang get their hands on these?! Yautja's are going to be super pissed, which is why you've got a perfect opportunity to become one of them, or to be more specific... A PREDATOR!
bm_suit_predator_samurai_desc: ''Just like Ginsu Knives, this one will cut through anything. You look Sharp!''
bm_suit_predator_exiled_desc: ''Conquer and reclaim your land along with the banks with this tribal outfit.''
bm_suit_predator_viking_desc: ''Death is a fate better than life. Make the best of it.''
bm_suit_owfl_operative_desc: ''Only the toughest and fearless get to put this high tech gear on them. Are you up for this?''
bm_suit_var_owfl_operative_white_desc: Keeps you warm even in the harsh cold conditions.
bm_suit_var_owfl_operative_red_desc: Is that your blood? Oh, thought it was mine.
bm_suit_var_owfl_operative_blue_desc: You see it often in the sky.
bm_suit_var_owfl_operative_green_desc: Don't mistake it with Yautjan Blood.
bm_suit_var_owfl_operative_yautjian_bloo: Keeps your enemies close, wear it with pride. Also you should know that your clothing is infused with the Blood of a Yautjan Predator so you will glow like a pair of glowsticks during day and night.
